## Notes for Reviewer (Codex/Copilot)

Focus review on:

- [ ] Security (auth, permissions, file uploads, CSRF/CORS)
- [ ] Performance (N+1 queries, heavy renders, unnecessary requests)
- [ ] Maintainability (naming, structure, duplicated logic)
